cab.content: ""t it""-!Governments His Britanmc^jeSECRET.OPERATIONS.Prom General Plumer, Italy, To :.- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 10 p.m. 13.12.17. Received 6 a.m. 14.12.17.0.118. December 13th.During the whole of the day the enemy's artillery has been active in the neighbourhood of Col De Berretta and Mt. Spinoncia and also on the French Sector. Attacks in the vicinity of Mt. Spinoncia have forced the Italians to retire from certain advanced positions, but they have held their own well on the whole.
